messages.title: Why we are backing Patrick Hall
messages.content: Local residents Rachel Jenkins, Tarlo Miah, and Mark O'Connell express their support for Patrick Hall, highlighting his understanding of issues like healthcare, the local economy, and his efforts to make Bedford & Kempston better.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Promise to freeze energy bills, expand free childcare, and scrap the Bedroom Tax.
Plan to secure more apprenticeships and support more businesses with a Business Bursary for hiring local people.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: An NHS with Time to care
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Commitment to campaign to end Bedford Hospital ward and service cuts, and ensure the hospital works for the patients and staff.
Proposed campaign for infrastructure improvements, including faster rail services for commuters.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The election in Bedford & Kempston will be very close. Every vote will count.

issues.health: Our NHS not safe in Tory and Lib Dem hands.

leaflet.personalStatement: "My priority has always been full-time commitment to local people, to listen and then take action on your behalf."

contactInformation.address: FREEPOST RSXT-XXCA-KJTA, Latrobe House, Cuthberts Street, Bedford, MK40 3JG

quotes.text: "The choice here in Bedford and Kempston is clear, it's Labour or five more years of the Tories. I have a clear plan for our area. Make your vote count - Vote Labour."

images.caption: Patrick pictured with supporters and local residents
